title: makarna_training
nomap: You can't fast travel out of this area without passing by the barracks first.
subheader: The inner wall juts out here, forming a stout reinforced guard tower, one of several that line the thick stone walls in a circle all around the inner city. At its base, land has been cleared and flattened to create a training yard, in which recruits for the Makarna Militia are drilled at all hours of the day in the ways of combat and defense. Up against the walls are straw archery targets, and heavily-battered wooden dummies stand at the other end of the yard.

events.title: Go to the Patron's Lounge
events.subtitle: A mysterious door here leads to the patrons-only area.

success.text: You open the door, and walk through into a mysterious ballroom.

events.title: Head towards the market
events.subtitle: The market street is a rush of busy wanderers and loud salespeople.

success.text: You leave the training yard and move towards the marketplace.

events.title: Rufo
events.subtitle: There is one guard in the training yard who looks familiar. A rugged and scarred body, that stern pose and mature face. It's Rufo, the lion who helped you escape from the king's harem.

events.title: Train with the Army
events.subtitle: The training grounds are regularly filled with activity, as muscular lions run laps, pump weights, and spar with eachother to hone their bodies to the peak of military strength. One of the drill sergeants notices you watching, and walks over to you. "Admiring the Makarnan way, eh? Come train with us if you like, and see how strong lions can really be!"

grizzsex.text:
You agree to a session of training with the Makarnan soldiers. You are lined up, feeling self-conscious next to the rows of muscular, tall naked felines. Before training, they do a Makarnan salute and recite the Makarnan anthem, both of which make you feel even more left out.

Once the actual training begins, however, they are surprisingly supportive. First you run laps around the training yard, including over obstacles like wooden rings and hurdles. Your legs ache and you stumble several times, but the lions catch you and guide you through, urging you to go on.

Next, you climb hand-over-hand across bars set up over a mud pit, and climb up over a tall wooden wall. Your arms are soon aching too, and you end up last out of all of the recruits, most of whom have clearly run this course countless times.

Finally, there is a sparring session. You are tossed a long wooden staff, and instructed on making basic parries and deflections in what they call "Wood Stance", a sort of martial art. It takes you a little while to get the hang of it, but by the end of training you are consistently blocking the kicks and strikes of your sparring partner.

At the end of it, you are congratulated on your hard work by the lions. They surround you, patting your shoulder and back and giving you congratulatory hugs. Being pressed so close to their musky, sweaty naked bodies is a little dizzying. Finally, they walk away, but only after each of them runs their fingers through your hair, a feeling that makes you shudder oddly. Is your hair a little longer than it was before?

events.title: Further Training
events.subtitle: The lions are extremely happy to see you back. The drill sergeant grins, and beckons you over. "Come on then. Let's see if you can beat your time!"

grizzsex.text:
This time when you line up, the other lions give you eager smiles. Several of them repeat the gesture from last time, where they run their fingers through your hair and call you "new recruit". You have to remind them several times that you're not actually joining the Makarnan army, but they just grin and don't reply.

The salute and anthem don't start when you expect. The lions are all staring at you, and one of them taps his bare chest. You realise what they are expecting, and begrudgingly you remove your clothes and place them aside, so that you are naked like the others.

They all salute, and you copy them, thumping your hand against your chest and holding it in a fist. You mumble through the anthem, still not knowing the words, but you put in a good effort and they seem to appreciate it. The pride of your fellow soldiers makes your heart pound, and you grin with pleasure at their approval.

You start running the same laps from last time. At first it feels awkward doing it barefoot, but you find that somehow you are going much faster than before. You seem to easily and dextrously step across the hoops, and you leap over the hurdles with glee. The other lions let out roars of support, and keep tapping or slapping your back as you pass eachother. You are so excited with how much you've improved, you barely register at all that there is golden fluff forming on your legs, or that your muscles are bulging more than they should.

You finish the laps, and bounce eagerly as you wait for the next part. Your toes flex on the ground, the hot Makarnan soil no longer feeling uncomfortable, as pink pawpads form on your soles, and slits form on your toes for your retractable claws. Your hair feels longer and thicker, waving in the wind.

Next comes the climbing bars. Your muscles burn and ache, but the feeling just makes you growl and go even faster. Golden fur spreads along your arms, and your claws dig into the wood as you rush forward. You pounce forward onto the wooden wall, the claws from your fingers and toes extending as they dig into the wood, and you start to climb up. You feel so dextrous, so powerful! Your muscles bulge, the golden fur spreading across your body, and a tufted tail forms behind you and flicks in the air.

You leap from the top of the wall, landing on all fours, and then jump up to your feet and roar with excitement. You were in the top three fastest! The other lions grab you, congratulating you and ruffling your mane. You purr a little, overwhelmed by their friendliness and praise.

Next comes the sparring session. This time you remember a lot of the basics of the stance, and you take to it quite quickly. You block your partner's kicks and strikes, and with each blow, you feel a little stronger, a little more comfortable in the Makarnan heat. Your whiskers twitch as they grow out from your face, and your body feels natural, like this exertion and these moves are made for you.

Finally, you finish up, panting and sweating. Your fellow lions open their arms wide, and you pounce forward for congratulatory hugs and head rubs. Their scent feels welcoming and warm. Your brothers in arms. Your fellow soldiers. You forget everything but the feeling of their bodies, and then you leave, dizzy and happy.

It takes you quite a while to realise something is up - you find yourself walking "home" through the Makarnan streets like you've lived here your whole life. You look down at your muscular, agile lion body, and realise you left all your clothes at the barracks! You return quietly, fetching your stuff, and think it might be safer if you don't show up for a third session...
grizzsex.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a muscular lion, trained in the ways of Makarnan martial arts. They look just like every other native Makarnan, fitting right in.

events.title: Advanced Training
events.subtitle: You can't stop thinking of your brothers in arms. Your fellow lions, training and working hard to defend your home country. Their strong feline bodies, their regimented discipline. It is very difficult to remind yourself that you're not a native Makarnan, not one of their soldiers. Your blood burns with a desire to prove yourself.

grizzsex.text:
Part of you knows that these strange feelings are unnatural, that you aren't actually a Makarnan lion soldier. You manage to resist the urge to return to training, though you find yourself walking closer and closer to the grounds, listening to them doing drills, smelling the scent of their hard-working bodies.

You think you are resisting it well...until you find yourself idly walking one day just a street away from the training ground. Your paws ache, your legs tense. You want to run in, to train, to be one with your brothers in arms.

Then you hear that familiar thump, of all your fellow soldiers hitting their fists to their chests in the Makarnan salute. Unconsciously, you realise you did it too. The words to the Makarnan anthem echo in your head, and you start to run towards the training ground. Your fur feels hot, and you strip off your clothes, throwing them aside without a care. You fall to all fours for better speed, as you rush into the barracks, and pounce into your place in line.

You stand up, your eyes glowing with pride and excitement, as you bellow out the last lines of the anthem together, in perfect harmony with your fellow soldiers.

"The dragons are our makers,

This bond will never sever.

Let all who hear us quake;

Makarna lasts forever!"

As you roar out the words, your whole body feels hot and intense. Your mind surges with pleasure and happiness, as an overwhelming feeling of belonging and pride washes away all other thoughts and desires.

You take to training today with great glee. Your padded golden paws are perfect for running laps in the desert heat, and you leap over the hurdles with feline grace. Your powerful arms carry you along the climbing bars, and your strong claws dig into the wooden wall as you climb it like a natural feline.

When you spar, you throw your entire body and focus into it. The Makarnan martial arts feel perfectly natural to you now, like you've been training with these your entire life. You wrestle naked with your fellow soldiers, and practice your kicks and blows until your whole body is aching and sore.

You even watch with envy as the most advanced warriors demonstrate the Four Material Stances, the greatest techniques of a Makarnan warrior. A master of the Wood stance takes a defensive posture, his fur crackling as his skin transforms into thick bark. A master of Water stance pounces, becoming a glistening torrent of water in the air before reforming on the ground. The Fire stance master immolates himself with a mighty roar, his fur transforming into scorching flames. Finally, a master of Wind stance demonstrates a mighty kick that splits a granite block in half, as a devastating lightning bolt strikes alongside him.

You remember admiring the stance masters as a lion cub, craving the day when you would unlock your own personal elemental stance. Maybe even one of the rare and mysterious time-based stances! You are so overcome with excitement and fantasy that you don't quite realise that your memories of once being a lion cub and growing up on the streets of Makarna are entirely new.

With training complete, you stretch your muscles and return to the barracks with your fellow warriors in training. This is where you've lived for years now, after all, ever since you joined the army as a full time recruit. You hop onto your bunk, mind filled with thoughts of glory in battle, and protecting your homeland alongside your fellow recruits.

The drill sergeant, a large scarred lion, watches you with amusement. "Settling in well, recruit?", he calls over to you.

You blink, slightly confused. Settling in? You've been here for years, you explain to him. He nods, and scratches his beard.

"Ah yeah, mistook you for someone else, a foreigner that was training with us recently."

You growl, and flick your tail with annoyance. You, a foreigner? You are a proud and loyal lion of Makarna! The drill master is probably just testing you again. Yes, you always have been a lion, and you always will be.

You settle down to sleep, surrounded by the gentle snores and feline musk of the other warriors just like you.
grizzsex.descriptionchange: This adventurer is a muscular lion, trained in the ways of Makarnan martial arts. They look just like every other native Makarnan, fitting right in.
grizzsex.trapped_desc: All of the lions in the barracks look just alike, all equally loyal and proud of their country.
grizzsex.trapped: You are a loyal, eager army recruit. You want only to serve Makarna, train with your fellow warriors, and obey every command your officers give you. Makarna Lasts Forever!

events.title: Reinforcement Training
events.subtitle: Your drill sergeant says he has some special training for you, in private. Just to make sure you're thinking like a loyal, patriotic Makarnan soldier should.

pumpkin_1.text:
You enter into your sergeant's office, a separate room to the side of the main barracks. A large Makarnan flag covers the wall behind his sandstone desk, on which is a tactical map of the continent. He is a muscular older lion, and as he turns you salute and stretch yourself up straight for his approval.

"Sir! Reporting as ordered, sir!", you say loudly. He nods.

"At ease, soldier. This is a special, informal type of training", he says with a hint of a smile. He points to a stone stool in front of his desk. "Strip down, and take a seat."

You blink with surprise. "Sir?"

He gestures again. "You obey your commanding officer's orders, don't you? You ARE a loyal soldier, aren't you?"

You feel a shudder of warmth through your whole body, and you quickly nod. "Sir! Yes sir!"

You strip down, pulling off your bronze bracers at your wrists and ankles, and pulling away your loincloth before sitting down on the stool obediently. The sergeant does the same, unbuckling the armour around his waist, and unwrapping the warm, well-worn lioncloth around his powerful furry golden crotch. It flops in his hands, a thick and damp white cloth, and he reaches forward and begins to wrap it around your muzzle.

"Breathe in", he orders. You do so, inhaling slowly and deeply. The sergeant's scent is heady and powerful, a thick beastly musk that makes you feel dizzy and warm.

"Breathe out. Breathe in. Breathe out."

With each command, you inhale his powerful scent, and blow it back out into the loincloth. Your fur tingles, your body gets hotter, and you feel yourself getting erect. Your heavy lion shaft bulges and rises up, and you reach down to touch it, before he grabs your wrist and shakes his head.

"You will not touch unless I order you to. You will obey my every command. You are a loyal soldier. Anything I tell you is fact. You do not need to think. You only need to obey."

"Sir, yes sir...", you mumble through the cloth. It feels so good to obey. To be a loyal soldier.

"You love Makarna."

"Sir yes sir..."

"You ONLY love Makarna. It is the greatest country in our world."

"Sir yes sir..."

"You love being a lion."

"Sir yes sir..."

"You have ALWAYS been a lion. There is nothing inside you but pure, perfect Makarnan blood."

"Sir, yes sir"

"The lions are superior. We lions will conquer all others!"

"Sir yes sir!"

With each command, each breath, you grow harder, more excited. Your blood pumps faster, your muscles tense. You want to fight, to obey, to lead your country into glorious triumph. Your eyes glow with hypnotic pride.

"You will discard all other loyalties. Only Makarna matters. You are a Makarnan soldier! You obey, and you fight!"

"SIR YES SIR!"

He strokes his hand along your shaft, making your whiskers twitch as you gasp with need. Then he steps back, and crosses his arms.

"Cum, soldier! Cum for your country, and worship only the Makarnan way!"

Your words are tangled up, becoming a roar of pleasure as your entire body becomes awash with heat and need. Your cock, without even being touched, throbs and pulses, then erupts with thick, hot ropes of cum that splatter all over your bare chest, dripping from your fur and running down your muscular abs.

You pant, dizzy and happy, confused and barely remembering what just happened.

"Tell me soldier, where did you grow up?"

"T...temple street, sir...", you mutter quickly. You remember being a young lion there, helping with your parents business, going to the temples every week for devotions, working hard to prove yourself and join the military. You shudder with pleasure at the memories.

"That's right. You've never left this glorious country. Why would you? You belong here, fighting for your king."

You nod, grinning and excited. You want to fight! To prove yourself!

"Go wash off, private. We have more training very soon. Dismissed!"

You stand and quickly gather your things, before heading out to the baths. Your fellow soldiers glance at your cum-drenched fur and chuckle, a few of them giving you lewd looks. It makes your tail twitch with delight.

events.title: Sparring Practice
events.subtitle: It's time for your favourite kind of training, sparring with your fellow lions.

pumpkin_1.text:
You are pumped and excited today. You feel in top form, every one of your pefect lion muscles ready and straining to prove yourself. When your sergeant opens the door to the training yard, you are the first out, hopping on your feet and punching the air with excitement.

You and your squad strip naked, your golden-furred bodies shining in the harsh heat. The sergeant then takes you through your stretches, and you glance over at the other soldiers, seeing their muscles bulge, their perfectly toned bodies moving and flexing before you. Your heart beats faster, your mind idly running with thoughts of loyalty and pride. The scent and sight of your brothers in arms reinforces and constantly drums into you how perfect it is to be a lion, how you would never want to be anything else.

After stretches, you follow along with the fundamental steps of each of the Makarnan martial arts, your body aching as you pounce and spin with Fire Stance, defend with Wood Stance, and deliver boneshattering kicks with Thunder Stance.

You get matched up for one-on-one sparring with another soldier, and he grins at you as he takes a battle stance. "Hey, how about this? First pin gets to pin the other tonight, if you get my drift", he purrs. You growl back, excited and eager. "You're on", you respond in an identical feline purr.

You both circle eachother, striking out, dodging moves, judging eachother's defenses. He goes in for a full attack first, lunging towards your chest, but you duck out of the way and land a few body blows. He recovers, and duck under one of your punches, then kicks and strikes at you, winding you for a moment.

He runs in for a tackle and pin, but you push back, catching him and wrestling him to the ground. The two of you punch and roll, struggling for dominance, until you end up on top. He's grinning and panting under you, his face and chest bruised, but his eyes excited. "Deal's a deal", he says.

Later that night, he slips into your bunk, his naked body shining slightly in the dim candlelight. His breath huffs on your crotch as his muzzle strokes along your thighs, and his thick wet tongue finds your shaft. He sucks and pleasures you, purring and rumbling, until you are throbbing and dripping with need.

You wrap your arms around him, pressing him under you, and he lifts his tail. Your thick lion meat slams into him as you mount him, thrusting and grunting and growling. He pants, stroking himself as you thrust harder and faster. Your body shudders with delight, and you ram extra hard into him right as you unload your hot, thick feline seed deep inside him. He growls, gasping and drooling, as his own cock covers his chest in dripping cum.

He lies together with you that night, both your bodies pressed close, warm and furry and wonderful. His voice whispers in your ear as you fall asleep. You are a lion. You have always been a lion. You will never be anything else. You are a loyal, proud, hot Makarnan lion...

events.title: Makarna Sandstorm Expedition
events.subtitle:
The captain of the barracks beckons you over, along with the others that share your bunkspace.

It seems that you have been deemed ready, and are being sent on your first mission beyond the walls of Makarna! (Contributed by PappaGobstopper)

events.title: Betray Chaz
events.subtitle: You feel like you have to tell Rufo the truth.  (Contributed by PappaGobstopper)

pumpkin_1.text:
He has a right to know.

But as you open your mouth to tell him everything, you feel your tongue swell up and gag yourself.

Rufo's eyes go wide as you feel magic pouring across your form, brown spotted fur rapidly overtaking you, cutting away who you were, and replacing your form with that of a ruddy male hyena.

"Spy!" Rufo snarls, leaping to his feet. "How dare you take their form?!"

Rufo lunges for you with his spear but you are quicker and dodge away, sprawling out into the bazaar. Your heart hammers in your chest as you sprint out of Makarna, into the desert, with the Makarnan guard hot on your heels, their spears delivering several nasty cuts to you.

But once you enter the desert, a sandstorm whips up, and within minutes, your pursuers are long gone.

Soon you are met by a shadowblade, who manages to calm the spirit guide. You feel your tongue deflate and your body returning to its previous form.

"Let that be a lesson to you." She sternly chastises, "No one snitches on the Boss." Before you can retort, she vanishes into the shadows and closes her eyes, disappearing from sight.
pumpkin_1.descriptionchange: You are a ruddy male hyena.

events.title: Tiger Training
events.subtitle: "No, no no!", you hear someone shout. You walk into the training barracks to see an exasperated sergeant with his face in his palm, and a sheepish-looking lion recruit with his hands held out like claws, in what you can only assume is a bad impression of a wild beast. A line of other recruits are standing awkwardly behind the sergeant, who composes himself and starts to snarl at the recruit. "With ferocity! Crouch over more. More than that! Now always be moving - no, not like that, you're going to-", he says, before being interrupted as the recruit trips over his own paws and lands awkwardly on the sandy courtyard. The sergeant sighs, and sees you watching. "Ho there, traveller. Trying to get these greenpaws to do some anti-tiger drills, but fighting against wooden dummies is no way to get to grips with how a tiger warrior moves. Though they are probably better than training against this fool!" he growls. The clumsy recruit looks away with embarrassment, and the grizzled sergeant rubs his chin as he looks you up and down. "Tell you what, son, I learned a few spells on my deployments. You let me turn you into a tiger, and you can train with us. My rookies get a real tiger to face off against, and you get free training from the mightiest army in the seven kingdoms! What do you say?"

grizzsex.text:
The old sergeant grins, an expression you get the feeling he does not use often. He rubs his hands together and takes a wide stance. "Right, let me see if I remember how to do this properly. Don't give me that look, don't you know all felines are gifted with magic? Of course I can do this!" he says. Your skepticism only grows when he starts to stumble over his words, and wave his arms in a very unconvincing manner. It seems to have done something though - you can feel the now-familiar tingle of magic as it crawls over your skin and wraps around you like invisible tendrils. You look down at your arms, and see the colour slowly changing, becoming a deep burnished orange, and then developing darker tiger stripes. A promising start, if not for one thing - there's no fur growing, only a shiny smooth texture that squeaks when you move your arms, and gleams very unnaturally. You watch the rubbery texture spread along your upper arms, forming plastic wrinkles and bends at your elbows. It also spreads down your hands, and your fingertips bulge out into puffy, cartoonish digits, before you grow stubby and blunt rubbery claws.

You try to warn the sergeant that his spell isn't working properly, but your voice comes out as a loud and high-pitched squeak. The pressure of your squeak seems to push at your face, causing it to bulge out and inflate. You feel a forced grin stretch on your growing squeaky rubber muzzle, while your vision blurs for a moment, before your eyes become painted-on colours on your smooth, rubbery head. You open your mouth and touch your rubber tongue and blunt artificial teeth, while the rubber spreads down your chest and legs. Your feet bulge out into puffy rubber paws, and a long shiny striped rubber tiger tail stretches from your rear and sways in the breeze. Your final change is the most embarrassing, as the rubber flows...

With your entire body now covered in tiger-print rubber, you feel your insides grow light and strange. A great hole seems to form inside you, replacing your organs and bones with nothing but inflated air. The sensation is very odd, as you discover that even the most cautious of steps is at risk of leaving you bouncing off the ground and through the air. The captain gives you a pained expression as he takes in your artificial, fake-tiger appearance. "Well...that's closer than the rookie's impression I suppose. Are you sure you were thinking tigery thoughts?" he says. You say something cutting, but you're still struggling with your squeaky-toy throat, and it mostly comes out as vaguely offensive squeaks.

Although you did agree to help the guards with their training, the futility of attempting to do so is quite clear the first time one of them baps you with a polearm and you immediately bounce across the courtyard. It's dizzying, but not painful. The guard's hopeful expression is dashed when the sergeant assures him that real tigers aren't actually that easy to knock away. Eventually, they give up, and the sergeant says he'll just do it himself. His terrifying roars and attacks are quite believable as a relentless tiger. You wonder if he missed his calling as an actor. Unfortunately, he's so occupied with his impression that he doesn't turn you back, and you end up leaving the training yard on your new inflatable rubber paws.
grizzsex.descriptionchange: This adventurer is an inflatable rubber tiger, with squeaky smooth skin and painted on stripes. They bounce as they walk.

events.title: The Unregulated Bar
events.subtitle:
This building can barely be called a bar. It's a few planks of wood leaning against the side of the wall to inner Makarna, with some more planks on empty kegs to form a makeshift counter, from which some cheap ale can be served. The guard post seems like a sensible place for it, considering how much traffic they are giving it.

The bartender, a particularly gruff and scarred hyena, leers at you when you sit down. "Hey there adventurer. We're running low on booze. Care to help me get some more? There's cash in it for you...", he says. One lion guard sitting nearby gives a nasty chuckle when he asks you that. Suspicious.

success.text:
You agree, with some hesitation, and the hyena wipes his snout then roots around in his pocket. He pulls out a small bottle and tosses it to you. "Drink up. Needed for the...delivery", he says.

You look down at the little clay bottle, and pull the stopper out. It stinks of booze. You hold your nose and drink it down, feeling the hot, sharp taste as it flows down your throat. You cough and wince, and thump your chest to help clear your throat.

The hyena starts to chuckle, and leans on the bar to stare at you. You feel a bit dizzy, and swollen. You suddenly belch, loudly, and it tastes of booze when you do. Your clothes start to feel tight, as your belly bulges out, growing larger and rounder. It feels firm and strange, and when you move, you can feel a very weird, sloshing sensation. You wobble on your chair, and then fall backwards, landing on your rear with a loud, hollow wooden THUMP. The bartender walks over, and pulls your shirt off, allowing you to look down and see the wood-grain planklike pattern on your bulging, swelling belly. You try to stand, but the sloshing inside you is getting heavier, and you can't seem to pull yourself up. The hyena just pulls your pants off, and he and a lion guard heave you up onto the bar. Your arms and legs wiggle helplessly as the bartender grabs a large copper tap, and shoves it firmly against your belly.

You feel the tap digging into your wooden bellybutton, and an incredible, relaxing and orgasmic bliss flows through you. Your toes clench and you moan, as frothing golden beer gushes from your tap and spills out into a pewter mug that the hyena is holding. He hands it to the guard, and twists your tap shut. You whimper and reach down for it, desperately wanting more, but your arms are too short now. Your body is bulging bigger and bigger, becoming a massive wooden keg, and you can do nothing but let yourself be used.

For the rest of the day, you serve the workers of the docks. Guards come in after their shifts, pull off their armor and reveal their sweaty muscular chests, and buy a mug of ale from you. Dockworkers, scaly, furry and feathery, walk in, wipe the sweat from their brow, and drink your ale. Each time you are used to fill a mug, you feel more empty, and light headed, and happy. Only your incredible strength seems to keep you going. Despite the many thirsty patrons of the bar, you can keep up with demand. You want to be a good barrel. You must serve. You let them drink up from you well into the night, until the sun sets and several of the workers are snoozing, drunk, on the floors of the tavern.

The hyena yawns and gives you a grin. "Damn, you made one fine barrel. You're the first person who ever lasted a whole night!", he says. You just grin dumbly, your mind full of beer thoughts. Your beloved bartender owner walks around and twists the tap oddly, and you start to feel strange. The bubbly warmth of your inner booze fades away. Your firm hard wood becomes soft and spongy, and you shrink. Soon, you are confused and dizzy, sitting on the countertop with a weird fleshy body and no way to serve the patrons!

The hyena pats your head and hands you a handful of the odd plants that Makarna uses for currency. "Give it a few hours, you'll feel normal soon. Come back any time!", he says.

fail.text:
You agree, with some hesitation, and the hyena wipes his snout then roots around in his pocket. He pulls out a small bottle and tosses it to you. "Drink up. Needed for the...delivery", he says.

You look down at the little clay bottle, and pull the stopper out. It stinks of booze. You hold your nose and drink it down, feeling the hot, sharp taste as it flows down your throat. You cough and wince, and thump your chest to help clear your throat.

You try to stand, but the sloshing inside you is getting heavier, and you can't seem to pull yourself up. The hyena just pulls your pants off, and he and a lion guard heave you up onto the bar. Your arms and legs wiggle helplessly as the bartender grabs a large copper tap, and shoves it firmly against your belly.

You feel the tap digging into your wooden bellybutton, and an incredible, relaxing and orgasmic bliss flows through you. Your toes clench and you moan, as frothing golden beer gushes from your tap and spills out into a pewter mug that the hyena is holding. He hands it to the guard, and twists your tap shut. You whimper and reach down for it, desperately wanting more, but your arms are too short now. Your body is bulging bigger and bigger, becoming a massive wooden keg, and you can do nothing but let yourself be used.

For the rest of the day, you serve the workers of the docks. Guards come in after their shifts, pull off their armor and reveal their sweaty muscular chests, and buy a mug of ale from you. Dockworkers, scaly, furry and feathery, walk in, wipe the sweat from their brow, and drink your ale. Each time you are used to fill a mug, you feel more empty, and light headed, and happy. Finally, the time comes when your mind is utterly free of thoughts or cares. You only have the pleasure of giving out drinks. It is your purpose. As your inner fluids empty, your arms and legs shrink even more. Becoming small nubs against your planks. Your head sinking in to the top of your keg form, while it flattens out and becomes more and more like normal wood. When your last mug is filled, you close your eyes, shiver, and sigh as you sink in completely, becoming nothing but a hollow, empty barrel.

The bartender twists your tap once more, checking for any empty drops, then pulls the tap out of you. He lifts you up and carries you to a big pile of other identical empty barrels, and leaves you there to dry out. Perhaps later you will be sold and used to carry goods for the ships, but you are now nothing but a container.
fail.trapped_desc: There is an empty beer barrel here.
fail.trapped: You are nothing but a booze-soaked wooden barrel, drying in the sun.

events.title: Drained and Empty
events.subtitle: You are nothing but an empty barrel, discarded against the wall. Nothing of interest and with no hope of anything fun happening to you. You are basically garbage.

pumpkin_1.text:
You sit helplessly, feeling your wooden body slowly dry out in the sun. Your insides feel empty, hollow and needy, with your "mouth" open into the air, waiting for anything to fill you. Of course, no one is interested in just another random empty barrel.

You see something arc through the air, and splatter against the inside of your mouth. It tastes sticky and slightly mushy as it slides slowly down your wooden inner walls and flops against the bottom of you. Is that...a banana peel?

Unable to move or react, you are forced to sit helplessly for the rest of the day, tasting and smelling the peel slowly turn brown and nasty. As the sun sets, you see a baker walking by with a bag. He notices you, takes a look inside, and then drops his bag into you. Crusty rolls of unsold bread tumble into your body, bouncing inside you and landing in a heap. In the morning, a guard walking past you tosses the remains of his lunch into you, a couple of greasy bones. This can't be happening. You're being treated as a garbage dump!

Weeks pass, and the stink and taste grows worse. A nasty stench and greasy, sticky feeling that lingers in the back of your throat. One you are helpless to do anything about. In the night, as you are feeling disgusted by your stench, you see someone creep up towards you. It's a short, filthy rat, wearing nothing but a tattered and worn pair of shorts held up by a rope. His hands and feet are caked with mud, and his fur is scruffy and filthy.

He lifts his head over your side and sniffs you. You feel his bare feet scrabble against your wood as he climbs up and hops inside. His filthy feet squelch in the muck and garbage within you. You can see him inside your body as he curls up, his back against one side of you and his feet pressed against the other.

He reaches down into his pants, and slowly starts to pump and stroke himself. He closes his eyes, relaxing and enjoying the moment, totally unaware that he is being observed. His skinny body breathes in deep, and he shivers with pleasure as his tail curls around some of your garbage. Finally, he shudders and moans, and his pants become darker and stained with wetness. When he pulls his hand out, his fingers are sticky and covered in dripping white cum. He curls up inside you, and soon falls asleep.

As you watch over him, you feel an odd sense of pride and protectiveness. You may be a worthless garbage dump, but you're of use to this skinny little rat. That's something.
